title: St. Patrick’s Day party could be linked to new Nova Scotia COVID-19 case - Global News
description: In a news release Thursday, the province announced there are five new cases of COVID-19 in Nova Scotia, bringing its total to 73.
content: A St Patricks Day party with about people may have been where someone contracted the new novel coronavirus according to Nova Scotias chief medical officer of health The province announced five new cases of COVID on Thursday with one not linked to t chars
